quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: Orum needs your help to save his friend, Waric.

quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: Talk to one torch, and return to Orum.

quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: Bring more items to Orum to make special powders.

quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: Return to the cave below Orum, and open all the barriers.

quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: As a reward, you get the Candle Helmet. Congratz!

quest.name: Orum Quest
Orum Quest
quest.text: Disobey Orum and go back into the cave and through the last barrier you opened.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You have already completed the Orum Quest, where you met Orum and Waric and got a Candle Helmet.
Now it is time to see them again, in a different hideout.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: Talk to Orum and offer your services.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You get an Orange Summoning Flower. Leave the Woodland Hills Labyrinth and place the flower in the right location.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You get a second flower, a Purple Summoning Flower. Leave the Woodland Hills Labyrinth and place the flower in the right location.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You get a third flower, a White Summoning Flower. Leave the Woodland Hills Labyrinth and place the flower in the right location.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You get a fourth flower, a Yellow Summoning Flower. Leave the Woodland Hills Labyrinth and place the flower in the right location.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: Your choice did not work. But you get the beautiful [@@897|@@] !
Orum needs another [@@661|@@] to complete the mixture. Give it to him.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You get a fifth flower, a Red Summoning Flower. Leave the Woodland Hills Labyrinth and place the flower in the right location.

quest.name: Orum and Waric follow-up quest
Orum
quest.text: You have finished Part 1 of the quest, and received the rewards. Well done! (Part 2 is OPTIONAL.)

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: If you choose to proceed, follow Waric's instructions and take the oath.

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Don't be a coward, and say the oath ! It's your last chance.

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Seem you are not made for the dark side...

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: You have received the Dark Magic Skill. Welcome to the dark side!

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Waric teaches you a spell to summon Wicked Mushrooms: #helorp (It requires 1 Dark Crystal and 1 Small Mushroom.)

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Waric teaches you a spell to poison players with a poison dart: #phlex (It requires 2 Roots.)

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Waric needs items before he will teach you the next spell.

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: Waric teaches you a spell to summon Snakes: #halhiss (It requires 1 Dark Crystal and 1 Snake Egg.)

quest.name: Dark Magic Skill
Waric
quest.text: That is all Waric will teach you, for now.
